segments.text: It's fascinating to watch the children's little heist unfold.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is quite determined to get those cookies, isn't he?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's got his hand deep in the jar, ready to grab a handful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The open cabinet doors just frame his mischievous actions perfectly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His little accomplice, the girl, stands nearby, reaching up eagerly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's clearly waiting for her share, her palm open in anticipation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There's something a little bit joyful about their secret adventure.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I have to admit, it brings a small smile to my face.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But then I remember the woman's complete obliviousness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Itâ€™s a bit disgusting how easily they can get away with this, right under her nose.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're quite sneaky with their plans.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The thought of all those crumbs they'll make does bother me a bit.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They are so focused on their sweet reward.
segments.speaker: PAR
